metadata.title: CVE-2019-16927 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Xpdf 4.01.01 has an out-of-bounds write in the vertProfile part of theTextPage::findGaps function in TextOutputDev.cc, a different vulnerabilitythan CVE-2019-9877.

criterions.comment: ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
